description: The estimated level of effort of the contract will be for 240 days.
duration_in_months: With a proposed period of contract from 05/12/2022 to 03/11/2023 (12 months in total).
full_summary:
================================

**Temporary Help Services Requirement - 9.2 Procurement, Senior**

**Reference:** PW-22-01011678, IRCC - 155524/A

**Publication Date:** October 28, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** November 7, 2022, 2:00 PM ET

**Bid Details**

* **Title**: Temporary Help Services Requirement - 9.2 Procurement, Senior
* **Commodity/Service Code**: R201BA (Temporary Help Services - Professional and Technical)
* **Procurement Category**: SRV
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering

**Contract Requirements**

* **Level of Effort**: Estimated to be 240 days
* **Contract Period**: Proposed to begin on December 5, 2022, and end on November 3, 2023

**Bidder Eligibility**

This RFP is restricted to supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who have previously qualified under Stream 9 – Procurement services categories, category 9.2 Procurement, Senior.

**Trade Agreements**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Contact Information**

For additional information, contact:
Valeska Fedoroschuk-Tait
IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca

**Attachments**

The solicitation documents and additional information can be found on the Government of Canada's buyandsell.gc.ca website, under [this link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/28/7836f47d500eefb52a75956b4d3eb5dc/npp-bilingual.pdf).  You are expected to read and understand
